review: Ever wanted to go on a Medieval-era crusade but can't because of annoying details like lack of time travel? Well, this announcer is pretty much the closest thing, heaped with massive piles of vengeful cheese, it is both hilarious and very fitting for a Wraithlord Announcer. Well worth the money
EXPLOSIOOOOOONS! AND GUNS! AND CHEAP RENAMED EXPIES OF ACTION HEROES! WHAT'S NOT TO LOVE!!!!! BROOFOOORCE!!!!!!!!!

The Bureau: XCOM Declassified is a brilliant game. It isn't like Enemy Unknown, but it is an amazing XCOM game. It is a shame to see so many negative reviews, comparing it too heavily with Enemy Unknown, but it isn't Enemy Unknown. It is an entirely different game. It might not be Enemy Unknown, but it is XCOM, and it is good

One of the best games I hav played on Steam.Its like DOTA, in that you pick a hero and upgrade them and kill enemies to get money, but there is a noticable difference in setting. Awesomenauts is in SPAAAAAACE!!!!!!!(Also, the announcer sounds like Mr. T)
Good for serious rocketry or for blowing little kerbals into oblivion, very fun!
